div.p: This optional attribute attached to the element SCHOOL (within BIOGRAPHY EDUCATION ) records whether the school is single-sex or inclusive. This attribute (with values SingleSex and Co-Ed) helps us to interpret the influence of single-sex education on women writers across historical periods.

div.codeblock: Miss Hannah Spray's Ladies' Day School

div.p: Remember this attribute and use whenever the gender makeup of a school is known.

The same body will have different attribute values at different dates. Many universities and colleges began as all-male, then gradually admitted women. This element and its attributes reflect this historical process.
